verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> spake יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

דַּבֵּר֙ <S%H1696><s%> Speak אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וְאָמַרְתָּ֖ <S%H559><s%> and say אֲלֵהֶ֑ם <S%H413><s%> about אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> unto them When either man אֽוֹ־ <S%H176><s%> or אִשָּׁ֗ה <S%H802><s%> or woman כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> When יַפְלִא֙ <S%H6381><s%> shall separate לִנְדֹּר֙ <S%H5087><s%> [themselves] to vow נֶ֣דֶר <S%H5088><s%> a vow נָזִ֔יר <S%H5139><s%> of a Nazarite לְהַזִּ֖יר <S%H5144><s%> to separate לַֽיהוָֽה׃ <S%H3069><s%> God

מִיַּ֤יִן <S%H3196><s%> [himself] from wine וְשֵׁכָר֙ <S%H7941><s%> and strong drink יַזִּ֔יר <S%H5144><s%> He shall separate חֹ֥מֶץ <S%H2558><s%> no vinegar יַ֛יִן <S%H3196><s%> of wine וְחֹ֥מֶץ <S%H2558><s%> or vinegar שֵׁכָ֖ר <S%H7941><s%> of strong drink לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> no יִשְׁתֶּ֑ה <S%H8354><s%> and shall drink וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> any מִשְׁרַ֤ת <S%H4952><s%> any liquor עֲנָבִים֙ <S%H6025><s%> of grapes לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> nor יִשְׁתֶּ֔ה <S%H8354><s%> neither shall he drink וַעֲנָבִ֛ים <S%H6025><s%> grapes לַחִ֥ים <S%H3892><s%> moist וִיבֵשִׁ֖ים <S%H3002><s%> or dried לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> nor יֹאכֵֽל׃ <S%H398><s%> nor eat

כֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> All יְמֵ֣י <S%H3117><s%> All the days נִזְר֑וֹ <S%H5145><s%> of his separation מִכֹּל֩ <S%H3605><s%> All אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> is יֵעָשֶׂ֜ה <S%H6213><s%> nothing that is made מִגֶּ֣פֶן <S%H1612><s%> tree הַיַּ֗יִן <S%H3196><s%> of the vine מֵחַרְצַנִּ֛ים <S%H2785><s%> from the kernels וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> even זָ֖ג <S%H2085><s%> even to the husk לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> shall not יֹאכֵֽל׃ <S%H398><s%> shall he eat

כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All יְמֵי֙ <S%H3117><s%> All the days נֶ֣דֶר <S%H5088><s%> of the vow נִזְר֔וֹ <S%H5145><s%> of his separation תַּ֖עַר <S%H8593><s%> there shall no razor לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> no יַעֲבֹ֣ר <S%H5674><s%> come עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over רֹאשׁ֑וֹ <S%H7218><s%> upon his head עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until מְלֹ֨את <S%H4390><s%> be fulfilled הַיָּמִ֜ם <S%H3117><s%> until the days אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which יַזִּ֤יר <S%H5144><s%> in the which he separateth לַיהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> [himself] unto the LORD קָדֹ֣שׁ <S%H6918><s%> he shall be holy יִהְיֶ֔ה <S%H1961><s%> become גַּדֵּ֥ל <S%H1431><s%> grow פֶּ֖רַע <S%H6545><s%> [and] shall let the locks שְׂעַ֥ר <S%H8181><s%> of the hair רֹאשֽׁוֹ׃ <S%H7218><s%> of his head

כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All יְמֵ֥י <S%H3117><s%> All the days הַזִּיר֖וֹ <S%H5144><s%> that he separateth לַיהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> [himself] unto the LORD עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and נֶ֥פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> body מֵ֖ת <S%H4191><s%> at no dead לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> shall not יָבֹֽא׃ <S%H935><s%> he shall come

לְאָבִ֣יו <S%H1><s%> for his father וּלְאִמּ֗וֹ <S%H517><s%> or for his mother לְאָחִיו֙ <S%H251><s%> for his brother וּלְאַ֣חֹת֔וֹ <S%H269><s%> or for his sister לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> shall not יִטַּמָּ֥א <S%H2930><s%> He shall not make himself unclean לָהֶ֖ם בְּמֹתָ֑ם <S%H4194><s%> when they die כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> because נֵ֥זֶר <S%H5145><s%> because the consecration אֱלֹהָ֖יו <S%H430><s%> of his God עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> is on רֹאשֽׁוֹ׃ <S%H7218><s%> [is] upon his head
כֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> All יְמֵ֣י <S%H3117><s%> All the days נִזְר֑וֹ <S%H5145><s%> of his separation קָדֹ֥שׁ <S%H6918><s%> he [is] holy ה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> he לַֽיהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD

וְכִֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> if יָמ֨וּת <S%H4191><s%> And if any man מֵ֤ת <S%H4191><s%> die עָלָיו֙ <S%H5921><s%> beside בְּפֶ֣תַע <S%H6621><s%> very פִּתְאֹ֔ם <S%H6597><s%> suddenly וְטִמֵּ֖א <S%H2930><s%> by him and he hath defiled רֹ֣אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> the head נִזְר֑וֹ <S%H5145><s%> of his consecration וְגִלַּ֤ח <S%H1548><s%> then he shall shave רֹאשׁוֹ֙ <S%H7218><s%> his head בְּי֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> in the day טָהֳרָת֔וֹ <S%H2893><s%> of his cleansing בַּיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day הַשְּׁבִיעִ֖י <S%H7637><s%> on the seventh יְגַלְּחֶֽנּוּ׃ <S%H1548><s%> shall he shave

וּבַיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day הַשְּׁמִינִ֗י <S%H8066><s%> And on the eighth יָבִא֙ <S%H935><s%> he shall bring שְׁתֵּ֣י <S%H8147><s%> two תֹרִ֔ים <S%H8449><s%> turtles א֥וֹ <S%H176><s%> or שְׁנֵ֖י <S%H8147><s%> or two בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> young יוֹנָ֑ה <S%H3123><s%> pigeons אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַכֹּהֵ֔ן <S%H3548><s%> to the priest אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to פֶּ֖תַח <S%H6607><s%> to the door אֹ֥הֶל <S%H168><s%> of the tabernacle מוֹעֵֽד׃ <S%H4150><s%> of the congregation

וְעָשָׂ֣ה <S%H6213><s%> shall offer הַכֹּהֵ֗ן <S%H3548><s%> And the priest אֶחָ֤ד <S%H259><s%> the one לְחַטָּאת֙ <S%H2403><s%> for a sin offering וְאֶחָ֣ד <S%H259><s%> and the other לְעֹלָ֔ה <S%H5930><s%> for a burnt offering וְכִפֶּ֣ר <S%H3722><s%> and make an atonement עָלָ֔יו <S%H5921><s%> because מֵאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> for him for that חָטָ֖א <S%H2398><s%> he sinned עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> because הַנָּ֑פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> by the dead וְקִדַּ֥שׁ <S%H6942><s%> and shall hallow אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> רֹאשׁ֖וֹ <S%H7218><s%> his head בַּיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> that same day הַהֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> same

וְהִזִּ֤יר <S%H5144><s%> And he shall consecrate לַֽיהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְמֵ֣י <S%H3117><s%> the days נִזְר֔וֹ <S%H5145><s%> of his separation וְהֵבִ֛יא <S%H935><s%> and shall bring כֶּ֥בֶשׂ <S%H3532><s%> a lamb בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> of the first שְׁנָת֖וֹ <S%H8141><s%> year לְאָשָׁ֑ם <S%H817><s%> for a trespass offering וְהַיָּמִ֤ים <S%H3117><s%> but the days הָרִאשֹׁנִים֙ <S%H7223><s%> that were before יִפְּל֔וּ <S%H5307><s%> shall be lost כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> because טָמֵ֖א <S%H2930><s%> was defiled נִזְרֽוֹ׃ <S%H5145><s%> because his separation

וְזֹ֥את <S%H2063><s%> likewise תּוֹרַ֖ת <S%H8451><s%> And this [is] the law הַנָּזִ֑יר <S%H5139><s%> of the Nazarite בְּי֗וֹם <S%H3117><s%> when מְלֹאת֙ <S%H4390><s%> are fulfilled יְמֵ֣י <S%H3117><s%> the days נִזְר֔וֹ <S%H5145><s%> of his separation יָבִ֣יא <S%H935><s%> he shall be brought אֹת֔וֹ <S%H853><s%> אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about פֶּ֖תַח <S%H6607><s%> unto the door אֹ֥הֶל <S%H168><s%> of the tabernacle מוֹעֵֽד׃ <S%H4150><s%> of the congregation

וְהִקְרִ֣יב <S%H7126><s%> And he shall offer אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> קָרְבָּנ֣וֹ <S%H7133><s%> his offering לַיהוָ֡ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD כֶּבֶשׂ֩ <S%H3532><s%> he lamb בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> of the first שְׁנָת֨וֹ <S%H8141><s%> year תָמִ֤ים <S%H8549><s%> without blemish אֶחָד֙ <S%H259><s%> one לְעֹלָ֔ה <S%H5930><s%> for a burnt offering וְכַבְשָׂ֨ה <S%H3535><s%> ewe lamb אַחַ֧ת <S%H259><s%> and one בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> of the first שְׁנָתָ֛הּ <S%H8141><s%> year תְּמִימָ֖ה <S%H8549><s%> without blemish לְחַטָּ֑את <S%H2403><s%> for a sin offering וְאַֽיִל־ <S%H352><s%> ram אֶחָ֥ד <S%H259><s%> and one תָּמִ֖ים <S%H8549><s%> without blemish לִשְׁלָמִֽים׃ <S%H8002><s%> for peace offerings

וְסַ֣ל <S%H5536><s%> And a basket מַצּ֗וֹת <S%H4682><s%> of unleavened bread סֹ֤לֶת <S%H5560><s%> of fine flour חַלֹּת֙ <S%H2471><s%> cakes בְּלוּלֹ֣ת <S%H1101><s%> mingled בַּשֶּׁ֔מֶן <S%H8081><s%> with oil וּרְקִיקֵ֥י <S%H7550><s%> and wafers מַצּ֖וֹת <S%H4682><s%> of unleavened bread מְשֻׁחִ֣ים <S%H4886><s%> anointed בַּשָּׁ֑מֶן <S%H8081><s%> with oil וּמִנְחָתָ֖ם <S%H4503><s%> and their meat offering וְנִסְכֵּיהֶֽם׃ <S%H5262><s%> and their drink offerings

וְהִקְרִ֥יב <S%H7126><s%> shall bring הַכֹּהֵ֖ן <S%H3548><s%> And the priest לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> [them] before יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD וְעָשָׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> and shall offer אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חַטָּאת֖וֹ <S%H2403><s%> his sin offering וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֹלָתֽוֹ׃ <S%H5930><s%> and his burnt offering

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאַ֜יִל <S%H352><s%> the ram יַעֲשֶׂ֨ה <S%H6213><s%> And he shall offer זֶ֤בַח <S%H2077><s%> [for] a sacrifice שְׁלָמִים֙ <S%H8002><s%> of peace offerings לַֽיהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD עַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> together סַ֣ל <S%H5536><s%> with the basket הַמַּצּ֑וֹת <S%H4682><s%> of unleavened bread וְעָשָׂה֙ <S%H6213><s%> shall offer הַכֹּהֵ֔ן <S%H3548><s%> the priest אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִנְחָת֖וֹ <S%H4503><s%> also his meat offering וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נִסְכּֽוֹ׃ <S%H5262><s%> and his drink offering

וְגִלַּ֣ח <S%H1548><s%> shall shave הַנָּזִ֗יר <S%H5139><s%> And the Nazarite פֶּ֛תַח <S%H6607><s%> [at] the door אֹ֥הֶל <S%H168><s%> of the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֖ד <S%H4150><s%> of the congregation אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> רֹ֣אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> the head נִזְר֑וֹ <S%H5145><s%> of his separation וְלָקַ֗ח <S%H3947><s%> and shall take אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׂעַר֙ <S%H8181><s%> the hair רֹ֣אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> of the head נִזְר֔וֹ <S%H5145><s%> of his separation וְנָתַן֙ <S%H5414><s%> and put עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הָאֵ֔שׁ <S%H784><s%> [it] in the fire אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which תַּ֖חַת <S%H8478><s%> is under זֶ֥בַח <S%H2077><s%> which [is] under the sacrifice הַשְּׁלָמִֽים׃ <S%H8002><s%> of the peace offerings

וְלָקַ֨ח <S%H3947><s%> shall take הַכֹּהֵ֜ן <S%H3548><s%> And the priest אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַזְּרֹ֣עַ <S%H2220><s%> shoulder בְּשֵׁלָה֮ <S%H1311><s%> the sodden מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> at הָאַיִל֒ <S%H352><s%> of the ram וְֽחַלַּ֨ת <S%H2471><s%> cake מַצָּ֤ה <S%H4682><s%> unleavened אַחַת֙ <S%H259><s%> and one מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> out הַסַּ֔ל <S%H5536><s%> out of the basket וּרְקִ֥יק <S%H7550><s%> wafer מַצָּ֖ה <S%H4682><s%> unleavened אֶחָ֑ד <S%H259><s%> and one וְנָתַן֙ <S%H5414><s%> and shall put עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on כַּפֵּ֣י <S%H3709><s%> [them] upon the hands הַנָּזִ֔יר <S%H5139><s%> of the Nazarite אַחַ֖ר <S%H310><s%> after הִֽתְגַּלְּח֥וֹ <S%H1548><s%> is shaven אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נִזְרֽוֹ׃ <S%H5145><s%> [the hair of] his separation

וְהֵנִיף֩ <S%H5130><s%> shall wave אוֹתָ֨ם <S%H853><s%> הַכֹּהֵ֥ן ׀ <S%H3548><s%> And the priest תְּנוּפָה֮ <S%H8573><s%> them [for] a wave offering לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָה֒ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD קֹ֤דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> this [is] holy הוּא֙ <S%H1931><s%> he לַכֹּהֵ֔ן <S%H3548><s%> for the priest עַ֚ל <S%H5921><s%> together חֲזֵ֣ה <S%H2373><s%> breast הַתְּנוּפָ֔ה <S%H8573><s%> with the wave וְעַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> together שׁ֣וֹק <S%H7785><s%> shoulder הַתְּרוּמָ֑ה <S%H8641><s%> and heave וְאַחַ֛ר <S%H310><s%> and after יִשְׁתֶּ֥ה <S%H8354><s%> may drink הַנָּזִ֖יר <S%H5139><s%> that the Nazarite יָֽיִן׃ <S%H3196><s%> wine

זֹ֣את <S%H2063><s%> likewise תּוֹרַ֣ת <S%H8451><s%> This [is] the law הַנָּזִיר֮ <S%H5139><s%> of the Nazarite אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who יִדֹּר֒ <S%H5087><s%> who hath vowed קָרְבָּנ֤וֹ <S%H7133><s%> [and of] his offering לַֽיהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> according נִזְר֔וֹ <S%H5145><s%> for his separation מִלְּבַ֖ד <S%H905><s%> alone אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> to what תַּשִּׂ֣יג <S%H5381><s%> shall get יָד֑וֹ <S%H3027><s%> beside [that] that his hand כְּפִ֤י <S%H6310><s%> according נִדְרוֹ֙ <S%H5088><s%> to the vow אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which יִדֹּ֔ר <S%H5087><s%> which he vowed כֵּ֣ן <S%H3651><s%> so יַעֲשֶׂ֔ה <S%H6213><s%> so he must do עַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> according תּוֹרַ֥ת <S%H8451><s%> after the law נִזְרֽוֹ׃ <S%H5145><s%> of his separation פ
וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> spake יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying
